review: The fire TV  was easy to install, but always use it with the extender. Without the extender the remote does not work properly. The main reason I got the fire TV was to watch cnn app and abc app. Both of them are available on Apple TV but not on fire TV. Other than that the product is average for the price. Good luck everyone!
